attributes.action: pay care workers double pay to work through the Coronavirus out break
attributes.additional_details: We struggle to make ends meet at it is as we’re classed as “low skill” workers. With current situations we’re vulnerable to this virus we can’t work from home, and therefor can’t iscolate if we don’t work we don’t get paid! Support your front line workers who are preventing people from going into hospital
attributes.background: With the current situation of Coronavirus spreading as rapid as it is. Us as care workers have no choice but to work. We are at high risk so is our families. We deserve double pay substitised by the government incase we become ill. We don’t work we don’t get paid and therefor can’t pay bills.
